items.title: Angola v Egypt: Africa Cup of Nations 2025 ‚Äì live
items.summary: Updates from 4pm kick-off (GMT) in Group B Get in touch: you can email Will about the game In shocking domestic news ‚Ä¶ my neighbours have put out their green bin in anticipation of a collection tomorrow but there is not one this week. When will people learn? In eight previous meetings, Angola have never beaten Egypt. The Pharaohs have been victorious on four occasions, with the same amount of draws. It would be a good day for Angola to notch their first triumph. Continue reading...

items.title: Wijzigingen in technische staf AZ: twee assistenten vertrekken
items.summary: Vlak voor de jaarwisseling zijn er twee wijzigingen doorgevoerd in de technische staf van AZ. Maarten Martens ziet assistent-trainer Kenneth Goudmijn vertrekken, net als keepers- en assistent-trainer Nick van Aart.

items.title: West Ham to back Nuno in January window
items.summary: Relegation-threatened West Ham are committed to backing manager Nuno Espirito Santo in the transfer market next month.

items.title: VI Live: Salah en Egypte tegen Angola, Marokko later tegen Zambia
items.summary: Ook maandag wordt er weer gevoetbald in de Afrika Cup. Het Egypte van Mohamed Salah staat tegenover Angola en Marokko treft Zambia. Volg het belangrijkste voetbal van maandag in deze VI Live.

items.title: Ronaldo wants 1k goals; open to Europe return
items.summary: Portugal captain Cristiano Ronaldo has reiterated his desire to reach 1,000 career goals before he calls time on his playing career.

items.title: Slot frustrated over injuries to Liverpool signings
items.summary: Liverpool have yet to get full value from their huge summer spending spree because of the injuries they have suffered, according to head coach Arne Slot.

items.title: Joshua helped from vehicle after fatal car crash in Nigeria
items.summary: Warning: This footage contains distressing scenes. British heavyweight Anthony Joshua is helped from a vehicle - in which he was a passenger - after a fatal car crash in Nigeria. (Pictures:@akinyemiabdulq1)

items.title: Amorim vreesde ontslag als hij systeem Man United eerder omgegooid had
items.summary: R√∫ben Amorim heeft benadrukt dat zijn systeemwijziging bij Manchester United niets te maken heeft met druk vanuit de media of de supporters. Tegen Newcastle United stapte de Portugese trainer voor het eerst af van zijn bekende formatie met drie verdedigers en wingbacks, en koos hij voor een viermansdefensie met twee controleurs op het middenveld.

items.title: Elftal van het Jaar: twee Nederlanders krijgen voorkeur boven wereldtoppers
items.summary: Nat√∫√∫rlijk maakt VI ook nu weer een Elftal van het Jaar met spelers die actief zijn in de buitenlandse topcompetities. Kleine verandering: dit keer kijken kenners buitenlands voetbal S√ºleyman √ñzt√ºrk en Bas van den Hoven alleen naar de eerste seizoenshelft. Er moeten harde keuzes worden gemaakt! items.title: Arteta: Arsenal 'actively looking' for January deals
items.summary: Arsenal manager Mikel Arteta has said the club are prepared to ease their injury problems by "actively looking" at signing new players when the transfer window reopens next month.

items.title: 'Domino effect' - Broad warns Ashes inquest could impact Stokes captaincy
items.summary: Stuart Broad has warned that removing ECB managing director Rob Key could trigger a domino effect that puts Ben Stokes' position as England captain at risk.

items.title: I thought I was going to die after collapse - Rush
items.summary: Liverpool legend Ian Rush says he thought he was close to dying after contracting superflu earlier in December and spending five days in hospital.

items.title: Time is right to change Man Utd formation - Amorim
items.summary: Head coach Ruben Amorim says if he had changed Manchester United's formation because of media pressure it would have been "the end" for him.

items.title: Ruben Amorim praises Bruno Fernandes for being a leader even when injured
items.summary: ‚ÄòI don‚Äôt know if he wants my job, but he‚Äôs a leader‚Äô Mason Mount a doubt for Wolves game Ruben Amorim has joked that Bruno Fernandes may want his job as Manchester United head coach after the captain observed training sessions and remained a vocal leader despite being injured. Fernandes could be out for up to three more weeks after sustaining a hamstring problem in United‚Äôs 2-1 defeat at Aston Villa on 21 December. Amorim was asked if the 31-year-old is still an influence on the team and offered a humorous response regarding his own role. Continue reading...

items.title: Amorim: Man Utd couldn't change formation due to media pressure
items.summary: Ruben Amorim says Manchester United's days of solely playing with a back three are over and revealed he refrained from changing formation earlier to ensure his players did not feel he was caving in to media pressure.

items.title: Joshua injured in car crash that killed two
items.summary: Anthony Joshua has been injured in a car crash in Nigeria that killed two people.
